title: Team Vastaya!
body:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/234020779296030721/299245783616585730/image.jpg
To protect my girl from devastation 
To unite the Vastaya against the Noxian nation 
To denounce the evils of human control 
To escape the reach of the magical toll
Rakan 
Xayah
Team Vastaya gets doubles at the speed of light 
Surrender now or prepare to fight!
Rengar! That's right!
######inb4 their lore basically overrights this -_-

replies.body: LOL I'm printing this up and putting it on the wall :)

> LOL I'm printing this up and putting it on ***the wall*** :)

"The wall?" Not just any 'ol wall, but ***the*** wall!?
Now *that's* an accolade! XD

Behold.
{{champion:34}} 
_**THE**_ wall.
Built by first Freljordians.
Constructed by Braum the Builder.
Enchanted by Yordles.
To protect from invasion of trolls.
Rised in case the Watchers would return, riding their giant spiders, bringing the Long Night with them.
Paid for by Noxus.
*gasp* the wall?!?!?
yes, **THE **wall!

As someone who has tried Swain jungle, I can tell you that his clear speed is so horrid that it will never work.  If I remember correctly, I was level 4 when my bottom lane was level 7.
Quinn Jungle, then?
You just weren't building AD swain.  (Pretty sure his E still boosts aa dmg)
Of all the places the challenge Noxus. Well guess {{champion:119}} gets to execute poor furryes.

Also, I'm pretty sure there's nothing "poor" when Draven is involved. ;p
Best way to die obviously.
When you gotta die, do it with style. XD
Rakan would approve.

Oh imagine Rakan with Draven in lane

{{champion:119}} They have to stand aside before my awesomeness.
(Rakan) They have to gather for my show!

*the two men glare at one another stylishly before deciding to just do both and murdering the entire enemy team with stylish dancing, jumping, and throwing. They are now best friends to this day.*
Oh god I can imagine them both bowing together hearing that now.

I'm a spiritual lyrical miracle individual
In their reveal page there is a short little bit of story in which they kill an Ionian soldier.  Not sure Noxus is the ones these folk are after.
I think its just a matter of them hating most everyone who's not as big a fan of wild magic as they are.  They throw shade at almost every region.
I'm pretty sure she says something against noxus in her quotes on youtube. Can't remember what though
